name: hit me [cry]baby one more time
description: “Hit Me [Cry]baby One More Time” is a creative compilation zine of some of the Devilman Crybaby fanart I made in 2018 with drawings and experimental edits made from my drawings, as well as 10 pages of a  Ryo/Akira comic. It’s  It’s 20 pages total, black and white, and SFW.
